name: Nasir Khan
aboutMeText: Hi, I'm Nasir Khan, a .NET developer with over 15 years of experience in software development. I specialize in creating robust and scalable web applications.

education.education1: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.education2: Master of Science in Software Engineering

work.work1Description: Developed and maintained web applications using ASP.NET, C#, and SQL Server.
work.work2Description: Worked on various software projects, including e-commerce platforms and enterprise solutions.

projects.project1Description: Developed a robust e-commerce platform using ASP.NET Core, enabling seamless shopping experiences with integrated payment gateways.
projects.project2Description: Built an inventory management system with real-time tracking and automated restocking features using ASP.NET MVC and SQL Server.
projects.project3Description: Created a healthcare portal for patient management, appointment scheduling, and telemedicine using .NET Framework and Angular.
projects.project4Description: Developed a financial dashboard with real-time analytics and reporting features using .NET Core and React.js.

cookieConsent: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience.
